oauth_dialog.instructions_html:
To connect your {provider} calendar:

  1. Click the "Start Authorization" button below
  2. Your browser will open to {provider}'s authorization page
  3. Sign in to your {provider} account if needed
  4. Grant EchoNote permission to access your calendar
  5. You will be redirected back to EchoNote automatically

Note: EchoNote will only access your calendar data. We never store your password.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.message:
Welcome to EchoNote!

EchoNote is an intelligent voice transcription and calendar management application that helps you efficiently process audio content and manage your schedule.
welcome.features:
Key Features:
• Batch audio transcription
• Real-time recording and transcription
• Calendar integration and sync
• Intelligent timeline management
